text: Besides Timothy's, "Grove Square Caramel Cappuccino Single Serve Cups" is another favorite K-Cup coffee to drink if your looking to stock up.. Taste fantastic, is just the right strength to get you going when you need to but not so strong where it gives you the shakes.. Highly recomend "Grove Square Caramel Cappuccino Single Serve Cups" if your looking for a new K-Cup to try...
